mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, t1.user_id AS userId, t1.user_name AS userName, t1.phone, t1.address, t1.amount, t1.apply_reason AS applyReason, t1.content, t1.`status`, t2.`name`, t1.refuse_desc AS refuseDesc, t1.create_time AS createTime, t1.update_time AS updateTime FROM apply_record t1 LEFT JOIN `user` t2 ON t1.auth_id = t2.id WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY t1.create_time DESC
